CustomField.formula: BusinessStreet__c + ' ' + BusinessHouseNo__c + IF(ISNULL(BusinessHouseNoExt__c), '', ' ' + BusinessHouseNoExt__c) + IF(ISNULL(BusinessAddressExt__c), '', BR() + BusinessAddressExt__c) + BusinessPostalCode__c + ' ' + BusinessCity__c + IF(ISNULL(BusinessCityExt__c), '', ' ' + BusinessCityExt__c)
CustomField.label: Gesch√§ftsadresse
